mapper.sql: id, order_id, `status`, content, picture, reason, money, create_at, update_at, deleted
mapper.update: update t_order_voucher set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BOOLEAN} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from t_order_voucher where order_id=#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted = false limit 1
